cab.content: REPORT OP THE PRESIDENT OF THE BOARD OP EDUCATION.Supplementary Estimates of the Board for expenditure on educational Services during the coming Financial Year were yesterday presented to parliament.In view of the probability that these Estimates would be taken in the House of Commons before Easter, the Department has been engaged in tabulating information in regard to the expenditure of Local Education Authorities and compiling statistics to show the effect which the new Grants sanctioned by the War cabinet will have in each area.Otherwise the Department has been engaged in the routine work of administration. .30th j&irch, 1917.
